      • alreadyExists

        static int alreadyExists(InventoryItem item,
                         java.lang.Integer low,
                         java.lang.Integer high)
        check the entire inventory if id of the food item in parameter already exist in the array, return location implement recursive binary search
        Parameters:
        item - food item for checking
        low - the left limit of current searching range
        high - the right limit of current searching range
        Returns:
        -1 if cannot find item, or index of item found
